00423 class uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base : public uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base {
00424 public:
00425   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base(const char* name_);
00426   virtual ~uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base();
00427   virtual bool is_transmitter() const;
00428   virtual void bind_export(sc_core::sc_export_base* b);
00429   virtual sc_core::sc_interface* get_interface() const;
00430   //
00431 protected:
00432   sc_core::sc_interface* m_iface;
00433 public:
00434   void umsg(const string & f) {
00435         char msg[1024];
00436         sprintf(msg,"uvm function not implemented by receiver: %s",f.c_str());
00437         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_RECEIVER_FUNC_NOT_IMPL_,msg);
00438     }
00439   virtual unsigned put_bitstream(
00440     unsigned stream_size, 
00441     void * stream  ) { umsg("put_bitstream"); return 0; }
00442   virtual void put_bitstream_request(
00443     unsigned call_id, 
00444     unsigned stream_size, 
00445     void * stream
00446   ) { umsg("put_bitstream_request"); }
00447   virtual int try_put_bitstream(
00448     unsigned stream_size , 
00449     void * stream
00450   ) { umsg("try_put_bitstream"); return 0; } 
00451   virtual int can_put() { umsg("can_put"); return 0; } 
00452   //
00453   virtual unsigned get_bitstream(
00454     unsigned* stream_size , 
00455     void * stream
00456   ) { umsg("get_bitstream"); return 0; } 
00457   virtual void get_bitstream_request(
00458     unsigned call_id
00459   ) { umsg("get_bitstream_request"); } 
00460   virtual int try_get_bitstream(
00461     unsigned * stream_size_ptr,
00462     void * stream
00463   ) { umsg("try_get_bitstream"); return 0; } 
00464   virtual int can_get() { umsg("can_get"); return 0; } 
00465   //
00466   virtual unsigned peek_bitstream(
00467     unsigned * stream_size_ptr,
00468     void * stream
00469   ) { umsg("peek_bitstream"); return 0; } 
00470   virtual void peek_bitstream_request(
00471     unsigned call_id
00472   ) { umsg("peek_bitstream_request"); } 
00473   virtual int try_peek_bitstream(
00474     unsigned * stream_size_ptr,
00475     void * stream
00476   ) { umsg("try_peek_bitstream"); return 0; } 
00477   virtual int can_peek() { umsg("can_peek"); return 0; } 
00478   //
00479   virtual unsigned transport_bitstream(
00480     unsigned req_stream_size, 
00481     void * req_stream,
00482     unsigned* rsp_stream_size,
00483     void* rsp_stream
00484   ) { umsg("transport_bitstream"); return 0; }

00486     unsigned call_id, 
00487     unsigned req_stream_size, 
00488     void * req_stream,
00489     unsigned* rsp_stream_size,
00490     void* rsp_stream
00491   ) { umsg("transport_bitstream_request"); }
00492   virtual void write_bitstream(
00493     unsigned stream_size , 
00494     void * stream
00495   ) { umsg("write_bitstream"); return; } 
00496 };

00529 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00530 class uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm :
00531   virtual public uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base,
00532   virtual public tlm::tlm_master_if<T1,T2>,
00533   virtual public tlm::tlm_slave_if<T2,T1>
00534 //#ifdef __TLM_ANALYSIS_H__
00535 #if !defined(NC_SYSTEMC) || defined(__TLM_ANALYSIS_H__)
00536   ,virtual public tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T1>
00537 #endif
00538 {
00539 
00540 
00541 public:
00542   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm(const char* name_) 
00543 #ifdef NC_SYSTEMC
00544     : uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base(name_), dummy_event("sync_"+counter++)
00545 #else
00546     : uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base(name_), dummy_event()
00547 #endif 
00548   {}
00549   ~uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm() { }
00550   virtual const string & interface_name() { static string s = "tlm"; return s; } // object->if_name()???
00551   unsigned connId;
00552   unsigned adapterId;
00553 
00554   // the put family
00555 
00556   virtual void put( const T1 &t ) {
00557     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return; }
00558     // blocking call, need to use mlupo from pool
00559     uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00560     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,v);
00561     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00562     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_put(
00563       connId, v
00564     );
00565     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00566   }
00567 
00568   virtual bool nb_put( const T1 &t ) { 
00569     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00570     uvm_ml_packed_obj& v = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00571     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&v);
00572     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00573     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::nb_put(
00574       connId, &v
00575     );
00576     return (ret == 0) ? false : true;
00577   }
00578 
00579   virtual bool nb_can_put( tlm::tlm_tag<T1> *t = 0 ) const { 
00580     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00581     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00582     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::can_put(connId);
00583     return (ret == 0) ? false : true;
00584   }
00585 
00586   virtual const sc_event &ok_to_put( tlm::tlm_tag<T1> *t = 0 ) const 
00587   {
00588       char msg[1024];
00589       sprintf(msg, "\nTLM interface is 'ok_to_put' \n");
00590         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(ML_UVM_UNIMPLEMENTED_INTERFACE_, msg);
00591         return dummy_event;
00592   }
00593   // the get family
00594 
00595   virtual T2 get( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *tag = 0 ) {
00596     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return T2(); }
00597     // blocking call, need to use mlupo from pool
00598     uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00599     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00600     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00601     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_get(
00602       connId, v
00603     );
00604     T2* t;
00605     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(v, t, t);
00606     T2 tt = *t;
00607     delete t;
00608     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00609     return tt;
00610   }
00611 
00612   virtual bool nb_get( T2 &t ) { 
00613     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00614 
00615     uvm_ml_packed_obj& v = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00616     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(&v);
00617     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00618     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::nb_get(
00619       connId, &v
00620     );
00621     if (ret == 0) {
00622       // do not touch the input argument
00623       return false;
00624     }
00625     T2* t1;
00626     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&v, t1, t1);
00627     t = *t1;
00628     delete t1;
00629     return true;
00630   }
00631 
00632   virtual bool nb_can_get( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *t = 0 ) const { 
00633     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00634     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00635     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::can_get(connId);
00636     return (ret == 0) ? false : true;
00637   }
00638 
00639   virtual const sc_event &ok_to_get( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *t = 0 ) const
00640   {
00641       char msg[1024];
00642       sprintf(msg, "\nTLM interface is 'ok_to_get' \n");
00643       uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(ML_UVM_UNIMPLEMENTED_INTERFACE_, msg);
00644       return dummy_event;
00645   }
00646   // the peek family
00647 
00648   virtual T2 peek( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *tag = 0 ) const { 
00649     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return T2(); }
00650     // blocking call, need to use mlupo from pool
00651     uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00652     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00653     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00654     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_peek(
00655       connId, v
00656     );
00657     T2* t;
00658     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(v, t, t);
00659     T2 tt = *t;
00660     delete t;
00661     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00662     return tt;
00663   }
00664 
00665   virtual bool nb_peek( T2 &t ) const { 
00666     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00667 
00668     uvm_ml_packed_obj& v = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00669     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(&v);
00670     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00671     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::nb_peek(
00672       connId, &v
00673     );
00674     if (ret == 0) {
00675       // do not touch the input argument
00676       return false;
00677     }
00678     T2* t1;
00679     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&v, t1, t1);
00680     t = *t1;
00681     delete t1;
00682     return true;
00683   }
00684 
00685   virtual bool nb_can_peek( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *t = 0 ) const { 
00686     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return false; }
00687     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00688     int ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::can_peek(connId);
00689     return (ret == 0) ? false : true;
00690   }
00691 
00692   virtual const sc_event &ok_to_peek( tlm::tlm_tag<T2> *t = 0 ) const {
00693       char msg[1024];
00694       sprintf(msg, "\nTLM interface is 'ok_to_peek' \n");
00695       uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(ML_UVM_UNIMPLEMENTED_INTERFACE_, msg);
00696       return dummy_event;
00697   }
00698 
00699   // analysis_if
00700 
00701   virtual void write( const T1 &t ) { 
00702     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return; }
00703 
00704     uvm_ml_packed_obj& v = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00705     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&v);
00706     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00707     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::write(
00708       connId, &v
00709     );
00710   }
00711 
00712 protected:
00713   sc_event dummy_event;
00714 };
00715 
00721 template <typename REQ, typename RSP>
00722 class uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm_transport :
00723   virtual public uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base,
00724   virtual public tlm::tlm_transport_if<REQ,RSP>
00725 {
00726 public:
00727   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm_transport(const char* name_) 
00728     : uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base(name_) { 
00729   }
00730   ~uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm_transport() { }
00731   virtual const string & interface_name() { static const string intf_name("tlm"); return intf_name; } // object->if_name()???
00732   unsigned connId;
00733   unsigned adapterId;
00734   //
00735   virtual RSP transport( const REQ &t ) { 
00736     if (!this->id_is_valid()) { this->unconnected_error(); return RSP(); }
00737     //uvm_ml_packed_obj req, rsp;
00738     // blocking call, need to use mlupo from pool
00739     uvm_ml_packed_obj* req = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00740     uvm_ml_packed_obj* rsp = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00741     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(rsp);
00742     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,req);
00743     unsigned connId = this->connection_id();
00744     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_transport(
00745       connId, req, rsp
00746     );
00747     RSP* t1;
00748     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(rsp, t1, t1);
00749     RSP tt = *t1;
00750     delete t1;
00751     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(req);
00752     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(rsp);
00753     return tt;
00754   }
00755 };
00756 
00758 
00764 template <typename T1, typename T2> class uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm
00765     : public uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base
00766 {
00767 public:
00768 
00769 
00770   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm(const char* nm) 
00771     : uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base(nm) { m_init_done = false; }
00772   ~uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm() { } 
00773   void init_interfaces() {
00774     if (m_init_done) return;
00775     iface_put = DCAST<tlm::tlm_blocking_put_if<T1>*>(get_interface());
00776     iface_get = DCAST<tlm::tlm_blocking_get_if<T2>*>(get_interface());
00777     iface_peek = DCAST<tlm::tlm_blocking_peek_if<T2>*>(get_interface());
00778     iface_nb_put = DCAST<tlm::tlm_nonblocking_put_if<T1>*>(get_interface());
00779     iface_nb_get = DCAST<tlm::tlm_nonblocking_get_if<T2>*>(get_interface());
00780     iface_nb_peek = DCAST<tlm::tlm_nonblocking_peek_if<T2>*>(get_interface());
00781     iface_transport = DCAST<tlm::tlm_transport_if<T1,T2>*>(get_interface());
00782 //#ifdef __TLM_ANALYSIS_H__
00783 #if !defined(NC_SYSTEMC) || defined(__TLM_ANALYSIS_H__)
00784     iface_analysis = DCAST<tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T1>*>(get_interface());
00785 #endif
00786     m_init_done = true;
00787   }
00788   unsigned put_bitstream(
00789     unsigned stream_size, 
00790     void * stream
00791                          ){ 
00792     init_interfaces();
00793     if (!iface_put) { 
00794         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00795       return 0; 
00796     }
00797     T1* t;
00798     //
00799     //uvm_ml_packed_obj vt; 
00800     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00801     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt,stream_size,stream);
00802     //
00803     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&vt, t, t);
00804     iface_put->put(*t);
00805     delete t;
00806     return 0;
00807   } 
00808 #define UMSGU(f) \
00809   { \
00810   char msg[1024]; \
00811   sprintf(msg,"uvm function not implemented by receiver: %s",#f); \
00812   uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_RECEIVER_FUNC_NOT_IMPL_,msg);         \
00813   }
00814 
00815   void put_bitstream_request(
00816     unsigned call_id, 
00817     unsigned stream_size, 
00818     void * stream
00819                              ) { 
00820     UMSGU(put_bitstream_request); 
00821   } 
00822 
00823   int try_put_bitstream(
00824     unsigned stream_size , 
00825     void * stream
00826   ){ 
00827     init_interfaces();
00828     if (!iface_nb_put) { 
00829         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00830       return 0; 
00831     }
00832     T1* t;
00833     //
00834     //uvm_ml_packed_obj vt; 
00835     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00836     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt,stream_size,stream);
00837     //
00838     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&vt, t, t);
00839     int i = iface_nb_put->nb_put(*t);
00840     delete t;
00841     return i;
00842   }
00843   int can_put()  {
00844     init_interfaces();
00845     if (!iface_nb_put) { 
00846         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00847       return 0; 
00848     }
00849     int i = iface_nb_put->nb_can_put();
00850     return i;
00851   }
00852   //
00853   unsigned get_bitstream(
00854     unsigned* stream_size,
00855     void * stream
00856   ) { 
00857     init_interfaces();
00858     if (!iface_get) { 
00859         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00860       return 0; 
00861     }
00862     T2 t;
00863     t = iface_get->get();
00864 
00865     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00866     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&vt);
00867     *stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt, stream);
00868     return 0; // ???
00869   }
00870 
00871   void get_bitstream_request(
00872     unsigned call_id
00873                              ) { UMSGU(get_bitstream_request); } 
00874   int try_get_bitstream(
00875     unsigned * stream_size,
00876     void * stream
00877     )  { 
00878     init_interfaces();
00879     if (!iface_nb_get) { 
00880         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00881       return 0; 
00882     }
00883     T2 t;
00884     bool b = iface_nb_get->nb_get(t);
00885 
00886     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00887     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&vt);
00888     *stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt, stream);
00889     return b; 
00890   }
00891 
00892   int can_get()  { 
00893     init_interfaces();
00894     if (!iface_nb_get) { 
00895         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00896       return 0; 
00897     }
00898     T2 t;
00899     //
00900     bool b = iface_nb_get->nb_can_get();
00901     return b ? 1 : 0;
00902   }
00903 
00904   //
00905   unsigned peek_bitstream(
00906     unsigned* stream_size,
00907     void * stream
00908     ) { 
00909     init_interfaces();
00910     if (!iface_peek) { 
00911         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,""); 
00912         return 0; 
00913     }
00914     T2 t;
00915     //
00916     t = iface_peek->peek();
00917 
00918     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00919     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&vt);
00920     *stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt, stream);
00921     return 0; // ???
00922   } 
00923   void peek_bitstream_request(
00924     unsigned call_id
00925   ) { UMSGU(peek_bitstream_request); } 
00926   int try_peek_bitstream(
00927     unsigned * stream_size,
00928     void * stream
00929   ) { 
00930     init_interfaces();
00931     if (!iface_nb_peek) { 
00932         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00933       return 0; 
00934     }
00935     T2 t;
00936 
00937     bool b = iface_nb_peek->nb_peek(t);
00938 
00939     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00940     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t,&vt);
00941     *stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt, stream);
00942     return b; 
00943   }
00944 
00945   int can_peek()  { 
00946     init_interfaces();
00947     if (!iface_nb_peek) { 
00948         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00949       return 0; 
00950     }
00951     T2 t;
00952     //
00953     bool b = iface_nb_peek->nb_can_peek();
00954     return b ? 1 : 0;
00955   }
00956   //
00957   virtual unsigned transport_bitstream( 
00958     unsigned req_stream_size,
00959     void* req_stream,
00960     unsigned* rsp_stream_size,
00961     void* rsp_stream
00962     ) {
00963     init_interfaces();
00964     if (!iface_transport) { 
00965         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00966       return 0; 
00967     }
00968     T1* t1;
00969 
00970     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt1 = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00971     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt1,req_stream_size,req_stream);
00972     //
00973     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&vt1, t1, t1);
00974     //
00975     T2 t2;
00976     t2 = iface_transport->transport(*t1);
00977     delete t1;
00978     //
00979     //
00980     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt2 = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00981     uvm_ml_packer_pack(t2,&vt2);
00982     *rsp_stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt2, rsp_stream);
00983     return 0;
00984   }
00985 
00986   //
00987   void write_bitstream(
00988     unsigned stream_size , 
00989     void * stream
00990                        )  { 
00991 #if (! defined(NC_SYSTEMC) || defined(__TLM_ANALYSIS_H__))
00992     init_interfaces();
00993     if (!iface_analysis) { 
00994         uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(UVM_PORT_IFACE_,"");
00995         
00996       return; 
00997     }
00998     T1* t;
00999     //
01000     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
01001     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt,stream_size,stream);
01002     //
01003     uvm_ml_packer_unpack_create(&vt, t, t);
01004     iface_analysis->write(*t);
01005     delete t;
01006 #endif
01007   }
01008 protected:
01009   bool m_init_done;
01010   tlm::tlm_blocking_put_if<T1>* iface_put;
01011   tlm::tlm_nonblocking_put_if<T1>* iface_nb_put;
01012   tlm::tlm_blocking_get_if<T2>* iface_get;
01013   tlm::tlm_nonblocking_get_if<T2>* iface_nb_get;
01014   tlm::tlm_blocking_peek_if<T2>* iface_peek;
01015   tlm::tlm_nonblocking_peek_if<T2>* iface_nb_peek;
01016   tlm::tlm_transport_if<T1,T2>* iface_transport;
01017 //#ifdef __TLM_ANALYSIS_H__
01018 #if !defined(NC_SYSTEMC) || defined(__TLM_ANALYSIS_H__)
01019   tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T1>* iface_analysis;
01020 #endif
01021 };

01024 #define uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(IF) \
01025 template <typename T, int N, sc_core::sc_port_policy POL> \
01026 void uvm_ml_register_internal( \
01027   sc_core::sc_port<tlm::IF<T>,N,POL>* p \
01028 ) { \
01029   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;     \
01030   string s = string(p->basename()) + "_trans"; \
01031   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<T,T>* trans = \
01032     new uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<T,T>(s.c_str()); \
01033   p->bind(*trans); \
01034   trans->object(p); \
01035   trans->set_intf_name(#IF); \
01036   trans->set_REQ_name(T().get_type_name()); \
01037   trans->set_RSP_name(T().get_type_name()); \
01038   uvm_ml_utils::trace_register_tlm("TLM1 port", p->name());     \
01039 } \
01040  \
01041 template <typename T> \
01042 void uvm_ml_register_internal( \
01043   sc_core::sc_export<tlm::IF<T> >* p \
01044 ) { \
01045   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;     \
01046   string s = string(p->basename()) + "_rec"; \
01047   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<T,T>* rec =  \
01048     new uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<T,T>(s.c_str()); \
01049   rec->bind_export(p); \
01050   rec->set_intf_name(#IF); \
01051   rec->set_REQ_name(T().get_type_name()); \
01052   rec->set_RSP_name(T().get_type_name()); \
01053   uvm_ml_utils::trace_register_tlm("TLM1 export", p->name()); \
01054 }
01055 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_blocking_put_if)
01056 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_nonblocking_put_if)
01057 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_put_if)
01058 
01059 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_blocking_get_if)
01060 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_nonblocking_get_if)
01061 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_get_if)
01062 
01063 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_blocking_peek_if)
01064 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_nonblocking_peek_if)
01065 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_peek_if)
01066 
01067 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_blocking_get_peek_if)
01068 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_nonblocking_get_peek_if)
01069 uvm_ml_tlm_declare_register_internal(tlm_get_peek_if)

01074 template <typename T, int N, sc_core::sc_port_policy POL> 
01075 void uvm_ml_register_internal( 
01076      sc_core::sc_port<tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T>,N,POL>* p,
01077      uvm_object * t_ptr 
01078 ) { 
01079   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;     
01080   string s = string(p->basename()) + "_trans"; 
01081   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<T,T>* trans = 
01082     new uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<T,T>(s.c_str()); 
01083   p->bind(*trans); 
01084   trans->object(p); 
01085   trans->set_intf_name("tlm_analysis_if"); 
01086   trans->set_REQ_name(T().get_type_name()); 
01087   trans->set_RSP_name(T().get_type_name()); 
01088 
01089   uvm_ml_utils::trace_register_tlm("Analysis port", p->name());
01090 }
